prompts: Create a fighting-type Pokemon with fiery orange feathers and a determined expression.
Imagine a bipedal Pokemon that excels in agility and has striking yellow and orange colors.
Show me a dynamic fire-type Pokemon that has a unique combination of fowl-like features and martial arts poses.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a fiery fighter, with bright colors and a fierce look.
Generate a medium-sized Pokemon with a vibrant orange body and a confident stance, perfect for battles.
Make a fiery bird-like creature that combines agility and strength, showcasing its bright colors.
I want to see a Pokemon that looks like a martial artist with colorful feathers and an energetic vibe.
